entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
